author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-EQS Group Sees 2018 EBITDA In Range Of EUR 1.5-2.1 Mln
text:
April 10 (Reuters) - EQS Group AG:
* FY SALES INCREASE OF 16%, UP TO EUR 30.36 MILLION * FY NET LOSS WAS EUR -218 THOUSAND
* PROPOSE TO DEFER MAY 18 DIVIDENDS FOR 2017 BUSINESS YEAR * ADJUSTED EBIT DECREASED BY 9%, DOWN TO EUR 130,000 IN OCT-DEC PERIOD
* SEES FY 2018 EBITDA BETWEEN EUR 1.5 MILLION AND EUR 2.1 MILLION
* OUTLOOK 2018: SEES SALES INCREASE OF 19% TO 24%, RESULTING IN AN ESTIMATED EUR 36 MILLION TO EUR 37.6 MILLION IN REVENUE
* OUTLOOK 2018: INVESTMENTS OF ROUGHLY EUR 2.8 MILLION ARE BEING PLANNED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
